Text: KK -- hard book to get.  The PDF is quite good, however, the .mobi is very poor -- either poor coversion or scan.  Thanks anyway.

yes,this was converted from pdf to mobi useing calibre as i couldn`t find a mobi version.you could try having a go converting it yourself,see if it makes a difference.
